tossup_question: -   –  What is the name of the process when a heated solid changes directly to gas without going through the liquid state?
bonus_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three titrations that would be neutral at the equivalence point: 1) Hydrochloric acid with sodium hydroxide; 2) Hypochlorous acid with sodium hydroxide; 3) Hydrochloric acid with ammonia.
